name: Quenterra's Hares: Twirl's Fishing Trip
description:
Twirl needs to go get a fish for... malevolent reasons. Her sisters are dragged along because ???. Fish are not caught.

2.9k word VN. not too, too long.
Art is sketchy. Probably won't come back to unless to fix embarrassing typos.

Contains: Tense situation, LOUD NOISE
intro music by my friend Lizzy :)
